definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: The gall bladder stores and discharges the bile, which helps to break down fats into minute droplets.
sentences.chinese: 胆囊储存和释放胆汁，协助脂肪分解为微小的颗粒。

sentences.english: Results Gallbladder of human body has triangular recess .
sentences.chinese: 结果人体存在胆囊三角隐窝。

sentences.english: Objective To study the treatment of atrophic cholecystitis with stones in the neck of cholecyst .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨萎缩性胆囊炎并颈部结石的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Laparoscopic cholecystectomies are successfully performed by us for 24 cases.
sentences.chinese: 成功地完成了24例腹腔镜下胆囊切除术。

sentences.english: Objective:To summarize the clinical characteristic of elderly patients treated with laparoscopic cholecystectomy .
sentences.chinese: 目的总结老年人腹腔镜胆囊切除术的临床特点。

sentences.english: Then the infrared spectra were recorded by the same equipment.
sentences.chinese: 选择特征性光谱与胆囊癌组织光谱进行比对。

sentences.english: Risk factors for small bowel bacterial overgrowth in cystic fibrosis.
sentences.chinese: 胆囊纤维化患者小肠菌群过度生长的风险因素。

sentences.english: Typically, they are not in the gallbladder .
sentences.chinese: 很明显，他们并不在胆囊里。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnostic methods for agenesis of gallbladder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨先天性胆囊缺如的诊断方法。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between abnormal position gallbladder plica and gallbladder diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胆囊皱襞异常与胆囊疾病的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between abnormal position gallbladder plica and gallbladder diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胆囊皱襞异常与胆囊疾病的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the causes of postgastrectomy gallstone.
sentences.chinese: 目的对胃切除术后胆囊结石的病因进行分析。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of glucose and lipid metabolism on gallstone formation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨糖脂代谢在胆囊结石形成中的作用。

sentences.english: She had been operated on cholecystitis.
Objective To investigate the clinical features and treatment for gallbladder carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胆囊癌的临床特点和诊治方法的选择。

sentences.english: Objective To study the appropriate treatments in acute cholecystitis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨急性胆囊炎的治疗方法。
